div.p: SURFACE OF THIGH AND STOMACH. [] (Comparison with Russian interesting, hence the group.)
rough draft to BEGIN TO identify synonym group members for analysis, based on CL etc. 18.11.2003. CH ／

note.p: gremium refers to the lap in general, especially as a place where one seeks protection or solace.
sinus refers to the bosom, all within the compass of breast and arms, and the word is also used in transferred senses "a bay" as well as figuratively "the heart/bosom" as the seat of feelings.

bibl.title: A Russian-English Collocational Dictionary of the Human Body
